page.title: 13Mothers Union and Playgroup
page.content: {Adbaston } The 19 members of Adbaston's branch meet monthly to hear a speaker dealing with subjects such as social concern or a visit to the Holy Land. An annual social event raises money for Mother's Union Overseas and there is also a summer outing. The worldwide purpose of Mother's Union is to strengthen and preserve marriage and Christian family life; the group supports this ideal. 19 children, aged from 3 months to 5 years, attend the Mother's and Toddlers Playgroup meeting every Tuesday in the Knighton Family Social Club. Activities include painting, sand, playdough and stories. The group is financed by the mothers.
